title: Beautiful Obsession
description: Fan favorite, Beautiful Torment (Beautiful Series #1), as told from Mr. Harrington's perspective is now available!Josh Harrington is a creature of his ways. Determined, a bit of a player, takes his career seriously, likes to have fun, but never mixes the two. Escaped from his life of privilege he's come a long way, but not without mistakes. He's is finally on the right track, until the first day of the new school year arrives and it seems the world decided to play the ultimate prank. Luci Cunningham walks into his classroom and throws his world upside down. Used to getting what he wants he finds himself having to wrestle between right and wrong when his dream girl turns out to be his student.Beautiful Obsession (Beautiful Series #3) is Beautiful Torment (Beautiful Series #1) as told from Mr. Harrington's perspective. If you're new to the series this book can be read first and is interchangeable with book #1.Warning: This book contains explicit language, sex scenes, and is intended for ages 18 and up.
author: Paige Laurens
